query.prompt:
For each row in the table, fill in columns 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 with the direct translation of column 1.
| Hindi | Roman (Word) | English | Italian | Sanskrit | Bengali | Japanese | |---|---|---|---|---|---|---| | हमारे | hamaare | | | | | | | जीवन | jeevan | | | | | | | की | kii | | | | | | | यात्रा | yaatraa | | | | | | | के | ke | | | | | | | मध्य | madhy | | | | | | | में | men | | | | | | | मैं | main | | | | | | | एक | ek | | | | | | | अंधेरे | andhere | | | | | | | जंगल | jangal | | | | | | | में | men | | | | | | | खो | kho | | | | | | | गया | gayaa | | | | | | | क्योंकि | kyonki | | | | | | | सीधा | seedhaa | | | | | | | रास्ता | rastaa | | | | | | | खो | kho | | | | | | | गया | gayaa | | | | | | | था | thaa | | | | | |
